title: 15 perch land for sale in Kotte
details:
Dear Sir / Madam,

15 perch land located in Beddagana. kotte

Square land with 25 feet road access. 2nd block from the main road.

highly residential area. can devided to 2 blocks as 7.5 each.

Price. 22 million perch. Negotiate

Please call for more details.

Regards
Dilan
